titleStmt.title: A vvarning to England: or, The nations looking-glass Wherein they may plainly see what are those good things, that are with-held by the sins of the nations. Also, vvhat are those national sins, which withold good things from us. Some of these have been lately endeavoured to be surprest by act of Parliament. To which is added, An earnest exhortation, to break off our sins by a timely repentance, least the Lord break forth in wrath against us. By Robert Russel, in Sussex, author of the Book of the unpardonable sin against the Holy Ghost. Licensed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Russel, Robert, fl. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Blare on London-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Copy stained; closely trimmed with slight loss of print.
Incorrect title and Wing number in reel guide.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
